hero.title: Make Your Home Special
hero.desc: If you want your home to have a unique interior, you can contact the Redesign Luxury team

bedroom.title: Bedroom
bedroom.desc: A well-designed bedroom offers an ideal place to escape daily stress and tension

kitchen.title: Kitchen
kitchen.desc: The kitchen is one of the most important parts of your home. You spend most of your time here. Therefore, the kitchen design should be comfortable and functional

living.title: Living Room
living.desc: A non-standard and eye-catching living room design will captivate everyone who sees it

kid.title: Kids' Room
kid.desc: We create unique designs for your children to have a comfortable and fun time

bathroom.title: Bathroom
bathroom.desc: The design of the bathroom is important in terms of ease of use, efficient use of space, and aesthetic beauty

hall.title: Hallway
hall.desc: Hallway design creates the first impression of the house. A beautifully designed hallway will give you and your guests a pleasant mood

laundry.title: Laundry
laundry.desc: A well-designed laundry room makes the process easier and helps save time

wardrobe.title: Wardrobe
wardrobe.desc: A well-designed wardrobe room makes it easy to organize clothes, shoes, and accessories properly and neatly

exterior.title: Exterior Design
exterior.desc: It is an important aspect in the field of architecture and urban planning. It enhances the functionality, aesthetics, and overall value of buildings and spaces

section2.title: Maximum Comfort with Minimalist Touches
section2.desc: Our professional team considers every detail of your interior design

about.title: About Us
about.desc: We are here to make our clients' dreams come true. Redesign Luxury is an interior design company offering the perfect combination of creativity and functionality in interior design

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.desc: Our mission is to help our clients make their living spaces more beautiful, functional, and personal. Each project results in unique designs tailored to our clients' unique needs and styles

landscape.title: Landscape Design
landscape.desc: It is a field carried out with the aim of planning, developing, and designing the landscape and natural environment of an area

exterior.title: Exterior Design
exterior.desc: It is carried out with the aim of planning, developing, and organizing the external appearance, layout, and arrangement of a building or property

interior.title: Interior Design
interior.desc: It is a field aimed at creating beautiful and practical interior spaces that meet the client's requirements and the functional needs of the space

projecting.title: Projecting
projecting.desc: It is the drafting of an initial description that allows the creation of an object from scratch under specified conditions

repair.title: Repair/Construction
repair.desc: It is an important process in modern construction that ensures durability and longevity

step1.title: Initial Stage
step1.desc: A visit to the apartment (object) is made for inspection and measurement. Based on the client's requests, several versions of the layout plan are drafted. A placement plan is prepared based on the layout plan selected by the client

step2.title: Design Stage
step2.desc: The design is prepared individually for each client. In addition to perfect design, a functional and comfortable interior is provided. Every detail is considered to be unique to the client, and designs that are beyond the standards and eye-catching are created

step3.title: Repair Stage
step3.desc: One of the most important and complex stages for realizing the design is repair. Our craftsmen are professional engineers. Entrust your work to professionals for quality and neat repairs

step4.title: Furniture and Accessories Stage
step4.desc: The selection of furniture and accessories should be done correctly to match the interior design. Every small detail is carefully selected to ensure the client has a comfortable and aesthetic interior

contact.title: Own the Home of Your Dreams with Redesign Luxury
contact.subtitle: Build Your Dream Home with Us
contact.name: First Name
